name: After the Fire (Captain Doctor)
description:
Build 0.1 Available now!

A young man nearly loses his mother in a freak and unexplained accident. As if going through that traumatic experience wasn't enough, now he must move in with his father who has been away his whole life. Luckily our protagonist is about to stumble upon a mysterious gift that will help him through this tough time.

If you would like to support me then please consider donating here on itch or visit my SubscribeStar page!

My Goal with AtF is to provide each new build with a complete route for a different character. This way no one feels teased.

Fetishes :

  • Vanilla
  • Voyeurism
  • Big Breasts
  • Milf
  • "Close Relationships" ;)
  • As well as some SS

I am also planning on adding more as the game develops!
